title: Ansible Pattern Schema
description: A schema for defining Ansible patterns

name.description: Machine readable name for the pattern, provide guidance on this

title.description: Human readable title for the pattern, may be used for pattern catalog and display purposes

description.description: A detailed description for the pattern, provide guidance on this

short_description.description: A brief description of the pattern that may be used for display purposes

tags.description: List of tags for the resource, provide guidance on these
